{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
  <TEXT>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib ist zu haben: </TEXT>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann Arnds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Paradies- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>fl. 2.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>24. kr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stahl</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>Pars II.</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>fl. 1. 30. kr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Poetevin</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Nouvelle Grammaire Francoise & Allemande</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>32. kr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Maier der Geistl.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Krancken Geistl. oder Seelen-Cur.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>48. kr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hauß-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>2. Theile</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
    <PRICE>40. kr.</PRICE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":16,"explanation":"1. Added <TEXT> tags to encapsulate the introductory text.
2. Corrected the title 'Pa\u221a\u00fcions- und Oster-Predigten' to 'Paradies- und Oster-Predigten'.
3. Corrected the author 'Stahiii' to 'Stahl'.
4. Corrected the title 'Nouvelie Grammaire Francoise & Allemande' to 'Nouvelle Grammaire Francoise & Allemande'.
5. Corrected the title 'Hau\u221a\u00fc-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft' to 'Hauß-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft'.
6. Removed extraneous  characters.
7. Ensured all <BIBL> entries are properly structured with consistent tagging.
8. Added missing closing tags for <FORMAT> and <PRICE> where necessary.
9. Corrected formatting inconsistencies, such as misplaced commas and periods.
10. Standardized the use of <VOLUME> and <FORMAT> tags.
11. Ensured all XML tags are properly nested and closed.
12. Removed incorrectly placed XML entities.
13. Corrected typographical errors in titles and authors.
14. Ensured proper encoding for special characters.
15. Added missing <TEXT> tag for introductory sentence.
16. Removed unnecessary newline character."}

<ITEM>
  <TEXT>Bey Herrn Johannes Christ seel. Frau Wittib ist zu haben: </TEXT>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Johann Arnds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Paradies- und Oster-Predigten</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>

  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ejusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Predigten von denen Egyptischen Plagen</TITLE>

  </BIBL>

    <TITLE>Fundamenta Chymiae dogmat. rat. & experim.</TITLE>

parsed.explanation:
1. Added <TEXT> tags to encapsulate the introductory text.
2. Corrected the title 'Pa\u221a\u00fcions- und Oster-Predigten' to 'Paradies- und Oster-Predigten'.
3. Corrected the author 'Stahiii' to 'Stahl'.
4. Corrected the title 'Nouvelie Grammaire Francoise & Allemande' to 'Nouvelle Grammaire Francoise & Allemande'.
5. Corrected the title 'Hau\u221a\u00fc-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft' to 'Hauß-Gebett-Buch, mit grober Schrifft'.
6. Removed extraneous  characters.
7. Ensured all <BIBL> entries are properly structured with consistent tagging.
8. Added missing closing tags for <FORMAT> and <PRICE> where necessary.
9. Corrected formatting inconsistencies, such as misplaced commas and periods.
10. Standardized the use of <VOLUME> and <FORMAT> tags.
11. Ensured all XML tags are properly nested and closed.
12. Removed incorrectly placed XML entities.
13. Corrected typographical errors in titles and authors.
14. Ensured proper encoding for special characters.
15. Added missing <TEXT> tag for introductory sentence.
16. Removed unnecessary newline character.
